trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Petersburg
There were no other sightings in Petersburg on or around August 3rd 2008
Summary: Bright fast moving light spotted then turned red and disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were standing outside around 10pm and noticed a really bright light moving fast across the sky (from west to east). At first I thought it was just the headlight of an airplane, but as it went overhead it still remained bright and had no strobes. It made no sound and was too low to be a satellite. As it continued to travel to the east it faded to a dim red speck of light and disappeared.
